org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class CreateRandomStoreFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.CreateRandomStoreFile

  • public class CreateRandomStoreFile
extends Object
    Creates an HFile with random key/value pairs.
